description:
A simple and intuitive public transit application for WMATA Metro Rail and DC Circulator in Washington D.C.

The following Metro Rail & DC Circulator bus lines are supported:
- Metro Rail: all lines
- DC Circulator: all lines

Note: WMATA Metrobus is not supported!

- Get arrival times based on actual train/vehicle locations (powered by Nextbus for DC Circulator)
- Find the stops closest to you
- Save your favorite stops for quickest access
- View map locations of routes, stops and vehicles
- View the WMATA station map directly in this app

You need a active internet connection (WiFi, 3G or Edge) to use Track My Transit - DC. The information of routes and stops is stored locally on your devices to save your data plan. But this app will not work without a active internet connection.

NOTE: Locations of vehicles are not supported for every line. This will not affect the accuracy of arrival times.

New in 1.0.1
- improved menu
- adjustements for Pre3 resolution
- switched to the new WMATA Alert feed since the old one has stopped working
